name: rentthatview
description: A vacation rental platform specializing in properties with exceptional views

scripts.test: echo "No test suite configured yet" && exit 0
scripts.prepare-deploy: npm run generate-env && npm run validate
scripts.build: npm run validate && npm run minify
scripts.minify: npm run minify:css && npm run minify:js
scripts.minify:css: echo "CSS minification - use cssnano or similar"
scripts.minify:js: echo "JS minification - use terser or similar"

author: RentThatView Team
